title: If we took someone from ancient Greece and showed them our world governments, what would this person think of them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every citizen, from every ancient culture, in your hypothetical scenario, would feel very protected in almost every country in today's world, under every government of almost any political system. Even in classical Greece, in the 5th century bce Athens, no government would have ever provided the protection citizens of the world, especially the western, are provided today. 25 or more centuries ago, life was not even close as safe as it is today!

“Everyone knows that the polis is the largest sized unit of society. Well, proper society, not that of barbarians (sotto voice: like you). Sorry, there is no way to govern as many people as you have.” They would love San Marino, Monaco, or Luxembourg. They might tolerate Switzerland, since the individual cantons are small enough, and aren’t linked in a unified, homogenized, mass of a state, unlike (everything in the EU, let alone the EU).
